Very nice, Aziz! And here is my Japanese-calligraphy-inspired Arabic calligraphy of the Lord's Prayer. The style is not the well-known classical Chinese style (short angular strokes) but one used to write poetry in paintings and letters - so called grass writing because of its flowing lines.
